news.title: Oil jumps more than 2% after Vance says Iran ignored key U.S. demand, military strikes on the table
news.summary: Oil traders are worried that war between the U.S. and Iran could lead to a major disruption of crude supplies in the Middle East.

news.title: FDA chief Marty Makary says 'everything should be over-the-counter' unless drug is unsafe or addictive
news.summary: Makary said the FDA is looking at prescription drugs like nausea medications and vaginal estrogen. Makary said he hopes to make changes this year.

news.title: The 'boomcession': Why Americans feel left behind by a growing economy
news.summary: A combination of the words "boom" and "recession" can help explain why Americans feel so sour about a growing economy.

news.title: As Walmart and Target head in different directions, all eyes are on their new CEOs
news.summary: The two big-box retailers are contending with the same economic backdrop, yet Target is trying to prove it can make a comeback. Target is one of the largest retailers in the U.S.

news.title: Mortgage rates sink to the lowest level in a month, sparking more refinance demand
news.summary: Mortgage rates dropped again last week, sparking a small jump in refinancing. But potential buyers were not impressed with the rate drop.

news.title: Why a 40-year Wall Street veteran is telling clients to sell everything American
news.summary: Andy Constan says the rest of the world now offers more opportunities. Andy Constan: 'The world is more open now than it was in the past'

news.title: Berkshire returns to the newspaper business, takes bigger bite of Domino’s Pizza
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway is making a fresh bet on the New York Times. It is a return to newspapers for the conglomerate after exiting them six years ago.

news.title: These are the only recession signals that matter to investors now
news.summary: Economist finds residential investment, equipment and durable goods are best signals of an economic contraction. Economist finds residential Investment, Equipment and Durable Goods are best signal of an Economic contraction.

news.title: Crude-oil futures rise on U.S.-Iran tensions
news.summary: Traders are assessing the possibility that the U.S. would attack Iran. Traders are considering the disruption that could cause to markets.

news.title: Nvidia’s new Meta deal may not be great news for these other tech stocks
news.summary: Shares of AMD and Arista fell after Nvidia and Meta announced an expansion of their partnership. Shares of AMD, Arista and Nvidia all fell after the announcement.
